headline: Assessing Fortive (FTV) Valuation After Mixed Recent Share Price Performance
summary: How Fortive’s recent performance sets the stage for investors Fortive (FTV) has traded around $56.90 recently, with mixed short term returns, including a 1 day gain and a 1 year total return decline. This may prompt investors to reassess its current positioning. See our latest analysis for Fortive. The recent 1 day share price return of 1.61% comes after a 7 day share price decline of 5.36%. The 90 day share price return of 10.29% contrasts with a 1 year total shareholder return decline of...
